properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
There is a Redeemer
Jesus God's own Son
Precious Lamb of God Messiah
Holy One

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Thank You O my Father
For giving us Your Son
And leaving Your Spirit 'til
The work on earth is done

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus my Redeemer
Name above all names
Precious Lamb of God Messiah
Hope for sinners slain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I stand in glory
I will see His face
There I'll serve my King forever
In that holy place
